layout.name: intro
layout.notes: Starts with horns on melody followed by drums then the whole band hits

layout.name: verse1
layout.lyrics: So when the worst of the world it is draggin me low...

layout.name: breakdown
layout.notes: Quiet down and build up. Drums change up. Horns and dueling guitars halfway through

layout.name: bridge
layout.lyrics: Because you're always at the forefront of my mind...
